sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { ViewMovieService } from 'src/app/view-movie.service'; // aqui debo injectar el servicio de movies, para que me jale la peli por ID @Component({ selector: 'app-view-movie', templateUrl: './view-movie.component.html', styleUrls: ['./view-movie.component.css'] }) export class ViewMovieComponent implements OnInit{ movie: any; constructor ( private route: ActivatedRoute, private viewService: ViewMovieService ) {} ngOnInit(): void { const id = +this.route.snapshot.paramMap.get('id'); this.viewService.getMovieById(id).subscribe(data => { this.movie = data; }); } } Vista Pelicula
